price: Àwọn ọkùnrin méjì kan nínú àwọn tí ń páyà (Allāhu) - Allāhu sì kẹ́ àwọn méjèèjì¹ - wọ́n sọ pé: “Ẹ gba ẹnu bodè wọ inú ìlú tọ̀ wọ́n. Tí ẹ bá wọ inú ìlú tọ̀ wọ́n, dájúdájú ẹ máa borí wọn. Allāhu sì ni kí ẹ gbáralé, tí ẹ bá jẹ́ onígbàgbọ́ òdodo.”
arabic: قَالَ رَجُلَانِ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخَافُونَ أَنۡعَمَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡهِمَا ٱدۡخُلُواْ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡبَابَ فَإِذَا دَخَلۡتُمُوهُ فَإِنَّكُمۡ غَٰلِبُونَۚ وَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَتَوَكَّلُوٓاْ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ
footnotes: 1. Allāhu ṣe ìtẹ̀lé-àṣẹ Rẹ̀ ní ìrọ̀rùn fún àwọn méjèèjì. Èyí ni ìkẹ́ Allāhu lórí àwọn méjèèjì.

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla rajulāni mina alladhīna yakhāfūna anʿama al-lahu ʿalayhimā ud'khulū ʿalayhimu al-bāba fa-idhā dakhaltumūhu fa-innakum ghālibūna waʿalā al-lahi fatawakkalū in kuntum mu'minīna
